nodes.text: A safe! I'm very interested!!!
I defeated that safe!
Wow! A Columbo class lock. My Houdini 42 should get me out of this one, but it's going to be really tough.
Wow! A Columbo class lock. Even if I had a Houdini 42 I'm not sure I could manage this. It's going to be really tough.
Oh, and one more thing...
If the Houdini 42 can open even the faculty safe, why do they offer them so freely to the students? ... oh well.
Alright, so... It's definitely... a lock... I think. A hard one, too... probably.
I know, I know... I should go study my locks.
It's locked. Hard to believe, I know.
There's nothing else of value in the safe.
The money's still in here, nice and safe. And as a Rogue, I'll leave it that way.
What have we here? Is that a contribution to my educational fund?
It's a box for petty cash! Not so petty to me... It's got 100 Lyra in it.
So, if only thieves steal from the school, am I really a thief or a Rogue?
I'd be breaking the rules of Rogue Class if I stole from the school... unless it's for a good cause.
Stealing is wrong...
But I need the money.
So much for that moral dilemma!
I guess I really am a Rogue. I'll just leave the money here.
Ha! Got it!
I'm nowhere near good enough to crack this beast! I'll need to practice more.
This is a very tricky lock... I just can't get my lockpicks to work on it.
If I'm going to try and crack a safe, I should at least bring some tools. I don't even have a lockpick on me!
Surprising - doesn't appear to be trapped. Then again, not every instructor here at the school has a degree in disarming traps.
Then again, all safes are magical, to a rogue!
